objects.text:
• Premium Black & Brown Leather
• Spacious Main Compartment
• Exterior Slip Pockets
• Gold-Tone Hardware

product_details.name: Elegant Two-Tone Designer Hobo Bag - Black & Brown Leather Shoulder Tote with Exterior Pockets
product_details.description:
• Premium dual-color leather design combining classic black and rich brown
• Spacious main compartment with generous interior storage
• Convenient exterior slip pockets on both sides for easy access
• Durable gold-tone hardware and sturdy shoulder strap
• High-quality stitching and professional craftsmanship
• Modern minimalist aesthetic perfect for work and casual use
• Versatile size suitable for daily essentials
• Sleek, contemporary color-block design
• Easy-access open top design
• Smooth leather finish with elegant sheen
• Professional look ideal for office and business settings
• Lightweight yet sturdy construction for everyday use

banner_details:
This banner advertises a premium two-tone leather hobo bag with a clean and professional layout divided into four equal quadrants. The top-left and top-right sections have soft beige and tan backgrounds, overlaid with the bold, uppercase **heading** and elegant **subheading** emphasizing luxury. The product image is centrally placed, overlapping the top sections, giving a dynamic and modern look. The lower-left quadrant includes the **description** text as bullet points, presenting the product features clearly in white. The bottom-right quadrant showcases a highlighted **price**, placed near a capsule-shaped **CTA button** labeled via the **cta** text. Subtle diagonal lines, decorative circles, and curves enhance sophistication without distracting.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Beige (#F5F5F5)
- Creamy Tan (#E8E3DF)
- Warm Taupe (#D8C3B8)
- Rich Mocha Brown (#634941)
- Deep Espresso (#3A2E2B)
- Accent Nude (#C2A592)
- Muted Clay (#67463A)
product_color: The product image showcases a two-tone leather handbag featuring a sophisticated color blend of deep black and rich maroon brown, joined at the center seam. The use of matte finishes amplifies the bag's luxurious texture while highlighting the transitional contrast between these tones. The handle is a muted rose-brown shade, offering a soft, blended accent that connects both main colors harmoniously. Accents of gold in the hardware subtly enhance the overall design without overpowering it. Ideal colors for the advertisement banner include Black (#2A2B2D), Maroon Brown (#5C2C24), Rose Brown (#8C5C51), and Gold Accent (#D4AF37), evoking elegance and minimalism.
